title: Yaaro Yaaro Lyrics Savaale Samaali Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Savaale Samaali Yaaro Yaaro Song Lyrics
Singer(s): M. M. Manasi
Music: Thaman

Yaaro Yaaro
niththam yaaro
kalvan kalvan undhan pero.
unnai kandaal ullam yaeno
thullum thullum yaeno yaeno.

Boomi melae saami pola
vandhu nindraai
nee yaaro
un mugavari tharuvaayaa.

Theekul ennai
nirkka vaiththu
petrol ooththi ne ponal
naan engae thappi selveno.

idiyaaga ennai thaakki
ponaaye neeye neeye.
mazhayaaga ennai nenaithu
ponaaye yeno yen ?

Azhagaale yudham seidhu
alaimodha vaithaai neeye
analaaga ennai modhi
kondraai neeye.

Boomi melae saami pola
vandhu nindraai
nee yaaro
un mugavari tharuvaayaa.

Undhan velvettu kannaale
vetti saaikindraai.
Ennai naai kutti polethaan
meikindraaye.

Yaaro Yaaro
niththam yaaro
kalvan kalvan undhan pero.
unnai kandaal ullam yaeno
thullum thullum yaeno yaeno.

Naan paartha aangal
oru kodi thaandum,
aanaalum unai pol
yaarum illaye.

Enai paartha aangal
pala kadi thaandum
aanaalum unai pol paarkavillaye.

Un azhagaale enai kolla
kadavul ninaithaano.
illai enakkaaga
unai vaazha sonnaanodaa..

Yaaro Yaaro
niththam yaaro
kalvan kalvan undhan pero.
unnai kandaal ullam yaeno
thullum thullum yaeno yaeno.
